Title: A new scene in Xiangyangyuan
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Xiangyangyuan ('sun facing courtyard') was an imaginary model neighbourhood from a novel by Xu Ying (徐瑛) and featured in the 1974 film The Story of Xiangyangyuan (向阳院的故事).The television is not meant for a private living room, but for a communal room in a housing complex.
